page.title: 14SYDENHAM INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.
page.content: Sydenham Industrial Estate is located between the Grand Union Canal, the Western Region Railway and Sydenham Drive. The Estate was built to provide small factory accommodation for the increasing growth in light industries, and to provide job opportunities for the area, particularly for women. The Estate covers an area of 50 acres.It was planned by A.C.Lloyd in 1950 and building started in 1962, the majority being finished by 1983. A portion of land near the railway is still to be developed. There are seventy-three firms, the largest being Soans, the Ford car dealer, which employs 150 people. Other important Industries on the estate include Food, Electronics, and Engineering.
